overview_of_class: Course Description: An advanced course designed to polish and improve language usage through in-depth study and development of grammar knowledge and skills, focusing on items most problematic for non-native speakers of Spanish.
name: Advanced Grammar
title: WCAS SPANISH 302-0-20 Advanced Grammar

Prerequisites apply, see description
